## EditorPlugin.Component property

React component that will be used to render the plugin. It accepts \[\[PluginEditorProps\]\] and `Props`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
Component: React.ComponentType<EditorPluginProps<S, Config>>;
```
